articles.title: EA Doubling Down On Live Service Games As Full Game Sales Drop (News Apex Legends) - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: EA managed to slightly beat its own financial expectations in a tough year.
articles.content: EA is continuing to move toward a larger live service-based games strategy as full game sales dropped 19% compared to the previous year, according to the companys latest financial report to investors… [+1382 chars]
